resources.string: Hi, Sir!\nTap on START to begin! 🚗
Hi Sir!\nHow can I help you? 🚗
To work, I need access to your\nSpotify music!💿
Use the FLOATING button, the VOLUME UP button,\nor a remote SHUTTER button to\nrecord a voice request!
Use the FLOATING button to\nrecord a voice request!
Please enable the \'Display over other apps\' permission first!
"Plays a song in Spotify from its album. Preference is given to your saved tracks and to albums over singles."
"Plays a song in Spotify from a playlist of yours. NOTE: the playlist must be listed in DJames' Vocabulary, in the Playlists tab!"
"Plays a song in Spotify from your playlist Liked Songs. NOTE: this will work only for your most recently saved tracks!"
"Starts a phone call to a contact of yours. NOTE: the contact must be listed in DJames' Vocabulary, in the Contacts tab!"

"Sends an SMS to a contact of yours. NOTE: the contact must be listed in DJames' Vocabulary, in the Contacts tab!

2-step process:
- 1) First, ASK to send a message to your contact
- 2) Then, WAIT for the second BEEP and dictate!"

"To use emojis, say:\n- 🇬🇧: \"EMOJI\" + smile / happy / grin / kiss / sunglasses / heart / sad / worried.\n- 🇮🇹: \"EMOJI\" + sorriso / felice / sorrisino / bacio / occhiali da sole / cuore / triste / preoccupato."
